message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with communication efficient secret sharing in the presence of a malicious adversary, which is a problem in information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The use of error-correcting codes and network coding also suggests categories such as distributed computing (cs.DC) and distributed systems (cs.DS). Finally, the paper proposes a new coding scheme based on Staircase codes, which is a type of erasure code used in network coding (cs.CC).
